import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import Zoom from "react-reveal/Zoom"; import { Fade } from "react-reveal"; import github from "../../images/githubg.png"; import ci from "../../images/onboarding.png"; import chat from "../../images/chatapp.png"; import pp from "../../images/portfolio.png"; import { FaCode } from "react-icons/fa"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { HiArrowRight } from "react-icons/hi"; export default function Projects() { return (

Projects
Github Clone

The GitHub Clone is a web application designed to mimic the user interface of GitHub, allowing users to search for GitHub repositories by entering a username. This project provides detailed information about each repository, such as the repository name, description, number of stars, forks, and issues.

HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Chat App

The Peer-to-Peer Chat Application is a real-time messaging platform designed to facilitate seamless communication between users. Built with modern web technologies, it offers an intuitive and responsive interface for real-time chatting.

MERN, Socket.io, Daisy UI
House Pricing Prediction

Boston House Price Prediction uses machine learning to analyze the dataset, identifying patterns to predict house prices for new data. Built with Flask, it leverages various algorithms for accurate predictions.

Python(Numpy Pandas Matplot-lib), Flask
Personal Portfolio

Welcome to my personal portfolio. Explore my work, skills, and achievements in a concise and visually appealing format. Get a glimpse of my expertise and creativity.

HTML, CSS, SCSS, React, JavaScript
); }
